content: *classic afghan in rich tones and patterns which echo the timeless beauty of stained glass two sizes small measures approx 33 x 50 and large approx 60 x 77 shown in patons decor using 5 mm u s h or 8 crochet hook patons yarns * skill level beginner materials patons® decor 100 g / 3 5 oz *9 colors 1 ball each for small version* *9 colors 2 balls each for large version* contrast a 16522 pale new green contrast b 16524 rich new green contrast c 16433 new rose contrast d 16434 rich new rose contrast e 01673 rich grey heather contrast f 01622 rich country blue contrast g 01621 country blue contrast h 01620 pale country blue contrast i 01630 pale taupe size 5 mm u s h or 8 crochet hook or size needed to obtain gauge worked in rounds of alternating colors written directions are provided in pdf download april 2011 french version april 2011 afghan en fenêtre vitrail au crochet 1 1 http //www patonsyarns com/data/pattern/pdf/patons_decor156_cr_afghan fr_ca pdf
